template.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
template.title: Identifier or synonym --> Database object.
template.longDescription: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.
template.comment: This is the template that the quick search runs. If the name is changed it also has to be changed for the quick search configuration - Rachel. Removed tags so no longer displayed - just used for quick search now. Rachel.

template.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
template.title: All genes in organism --> Publications.
template.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in one organism. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name

template.name: AllGene_Chromosome
template.title: All genes in organism --> All chromosomal locations.
template.longDescription: Show the chromosomal location and sequence for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AllGene_Chromosome
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.length Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

template.name: allGO_GeneOrganism_1
template.title: GO term name/id [and children of this term] --> Genes in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: Find all genes that are associated with a particular GO term in a specific organism. This template will return genes that have been assigned the given GO term as well as genes that have a more specific GO term.

query.name: allGO_GeneOrganism_1
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.allGoAnnotation.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.actualGoTerms.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.actualGoTerms.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.qualifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.namespace

constraint.description: that have the following GO term:

template.name: ChromLocation_Gene
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show the genes located between two points on a chromosome. (Data Source: FlyBase, Ensembl).

query.name: ChromLocation_Gene
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show the genes located on chromosome:

template.name: Chromosome_Gene
template.title: Chromosome --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand

template.name: Gene_allGOTerms
template.title: Gene --> GO terms and parents of those terms.
template.longDescription: Given a gene show the associated GO terms, and the all parents to the top of the directed graph. If 'isPrimaryAssignment' is 'true' then that GO term was actually assigned to the gene. Likewise if it is false then the GO term is some more general parent term.

query.name: Gene_allGOTerms
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.namespace Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.allGoAnnotation.qualifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.isPrimaryAssignment

template.name: Gene_GO
template.title: Gene --> GO terms.
template.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_GO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.property.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.property.name Gene.goAnnotation.property.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier

template.name: Gene_Identifiers
template.title: Gene --> All identifiers.
template.longDescription: Show all identifiers for a gene, given an identifier.
template.comment: 07:02:07:Updated to work from gene identifier - Rachel.

template.name: Gene_particularGoannotation
template.title: Gene + GO term name --> Gene with the GO term name.
template.longDescription: Show if the following gene has the following GO term.

constraint.description: show whether it/they have been annotated with the following:

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins.
template.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

template.name: Gene_To_Publications
template.title: Gene --> Publications.
template.longDescription: Returns a list of publications that reference a selected gene. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year

template.name: GO_name_Gene
template.title: GO term name/id --> Genes in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: Search for genes in one specific organism that have been asociated with a particular GO annotation.

template.name: GOname_GOidentifier
template.title: GO term name --> GO term identifier.
template.longDescription: Find the GO identifier for a specific term.

template.name: GOtermidentifier_name
template.title: GO term identifier --> GO term name.
template.longDescription: Give the GO term name for a particular GO term identifier. (Data Source: GO)

template.name: Organism_Gene
template.title: Organism --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show all the genes for a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all the genes from organism:

template.name: Organism_Protein
template.title: Organism --> All proteins.
template.longDescription: Show all the proteins from a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all the proteins from the organism:

template.name: Organism_Transcript
template.title: Organism --> All transcripts.
template.longDescription: For a particular organism, show all its transcripts. (Data Source: FlyBase, Ensembl).

template.name: Pathway_Genes
template.title: KEGG pathway --> D. melanogaster genes.
template.longDescription: For a particular KEGG pathway, list all the D. melanogaster genes that are involved. (Data Source: KEGG).

template.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
template.title: Protein --> Gene.
template.longDescription: Show the gene that codes for the following protein, with its chromosomal location and length.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from protein class - Philip

query.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.start Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.end Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.strand Protein.genes.length

template.name: Protein_GOterms
template.title: Protein --> GO terms.
template.longDescription: Show all GO terms that have been associated with the gene that codes for the following protein.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from protein class - Philip

template.name: Protein_GOtermsSpecificOntology
template.title: Protein --> GO terms from a specific GO ontology.
template.longDescription: Show the GO annotations for a protein or proteins from a specifc GO ontology (cellular_component, molecular_function, biological_process).

query.name: Protein_GOtermsSpecificOntology
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.goAnnotation.property.namespace Protein.genes.goAnnotation.property.identifier Protein.genes.goAnnotation.property.name

constraint.description: Show GO annotaion for the following protein(s):

template.name: Publication_Genes
template.title: Publication --> Genes.
template.longDescription: Show all genes that were mentioned in a specific publication. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: Publication_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.year
